abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column observes that television commentators thought New York Giants receiver Odell Beckham Jr's behavior in game against Carolina Panthers warranted ejection, even though officials and Giants Coach Tom Coughlin did not.
lead_paragraph: When Odell Beckham Jr. launched a helmet-to-helmet hit in the third period, the Fox Sports crew suggested that his behavior had become worthy of ejection.

headline.main: Fox Crew Gets Beckham, Even if Officials and Coughlin Do Not
headline.print_headline: Fox Crew Gets It, Even if Officials and Coughlin Do Not

snippet: When Odell Beckham Jr. launched a helmet-to-helmet hit in the third period, the Fox Sports crew suggested that his behavior had become worthy of ejection.
